title: run the pretrain model get lowest precision but high recall
body:
## üêõ Bug
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.
when I run your pretrain model download from your Google Cloud Drive...for testing the 5k data from coco, I get the too low precision... I don't know what happen,,,
`
Namespace(batch_size=32, cfg='cfg/yolov3-spp.cfg', conf_thres=0.001, data='data/coco2014.data', device='0', img_size=416, iou_thres=0.6, profile=False, save_json=True, single_cls=False, task='test', weights='weights/yolov3-spp-ultralytics.pt')

          motorcycle     5e+03       390    0.0573     0.887      0.68     0.108
